title: MPs urge Reeves to raise gambling taxes despite ‘scaremongering’ from firms
description: Treasury select committee calls for higher duties on most addictive forms, such as high-street slots and online games
content:
The chancellor should ignore “scaremongering” by gambling firms and raise taxes on the £11bn sector’s most harmful products, MPs on the influential Treasury select committee have said.
In a scathing report, delivered as Rachel Reeves’s Treasury team ... [3151 chars]

title: McDonald's managers in UK to get sexual abuse training
description: The announcement by the equality watchdog comes after a BBC investigation into abuse at the restaurant chain.
content:

Noor Nanji & Zoe ConwayBBC News

title: Met police’s culture makes racial harm ‘inevitable’, internal review finds
description: The revew, the first to focus on the racism of the institution as a whole, found a culture and leadership determined to prevent real change
content:
The “racial harm” the Metropolitan police inflicts on black people is “institutionally defended”, with its leadership and culture protecting the force from real change, an internal review has found.
The report by Dr Shereen Daniels, published on Frid... [5109 chars]

title: Ismaila Sarr shines in Crystal Palace Europa Conference League win
description: Ismaila Sarr shines as Crystal Palace earn first home victory in Europa Conference League this term.
content:
Filling the boots of Eberechi Eze was never going to be easy.

description: Algerian sex offender Brahim Kaddour-Cherif is still at large but fraudster Billy Smith hands himself back in.
